title: Am I the only person who misses the Runeglaive enchantment?
body: Remember Runeglaive Ezreal in the mid lane? Good old times. Pink smite with Runeglaive enchantment was so fun to play with and it would let you play someone like Ekko in the jungle and f*cking destroy.

replies.body: I only miss it because old gangplank could crit with it and deal magic damage on his Q while he does physical on his basic attacks.
Runeglaive: the item that let everyone be old full crit poppy for a day.
the first jungle knife i ever built was devourer. i missed being busted on old ww  with {{item:3124}} {{item:3153}}{{item:3146}} and a stacked devourer
